entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perfect Hash-based dispatch for integer switch case #66604
  • Difference between IIncrementalGenerator RegisterImplementationSourceOutput vs RegisterSourceOutput #66601
  • Refactoring a method with "Change Signature" adds unnecessary named argument labels when caller has in-order argument label #66600
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66597
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysisis.Scripting.ScriptOptions' threw an exception. #66592

Closed

  • SourceGenerators in shared compilation can cause MissingMethodException #66104
    17.6
  • Reenable AssemblyLoading_MultipleVersions_ExactAndGreaterMatch #60763
    17.6
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods in `SyntaxGenerator` #66375
  • Code Cleanup / IDE0032 causes errors in partial classes with manual properties #66320
    Backlog
  • Avoid including pdb in NuGet packages #66595
  • The SyntaxGenerator adds redundant static keyword to constant fields #66380
  • Add support for a generation of a finalizer (destructor) in the `SyntaxGenerator` #66374
  • Switch `EmitContext` to hold a syntax reference instead of a syntax node #66371
    17.6
  • Proposal: Allow specifying directory for Source Generator emitted files #66122
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix semicolon placement in statement-placement fixer #66610
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer suggestion to swap ref-structs/pointers using a tuple #66609
    Area-IDE
  • Keep identity struct casts that may be necessary to preserve semantics #66607
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 Servicing: Fix null ref in change signature #66606
    Area-IDE
  • 17.4 servicing: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66605
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `default` constraint on an override when needed. #66603
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading default values in IVisualStudioStorageReadFallback implementations #66599
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove BCL dependencies from insertion list #66602
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix serialization of CSharpIdeCodeStyleOptions.Common options #66501
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Add support for generating explicit-interface members from SyntaxGenerator #66598
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not restrict field locations to the same document for "Replace with autoproperty" refactoring #66555
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not emit 'static' modifier on 'const' field #66594
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Instrumentation state #66429
    Next
  • Add support for generating destructors in SyntaxGenerator #66593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable static restore in more locations #66567
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66591
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66611
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Introduce parameter - don't offer for arguments or attribute arguments #66577
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
